header_text: It's Saturday night, and you are at home. You hear your neighbors having a party, and you feel sad since you don't have plans tonight. You remember that there will be many other chances to see your friends, and you feel happy to be relaxing at home.

elements.Text: Will all of your weekends be spent like this?
